si.title: இன்றைய நாணயமாற்று விகிதம்
body_lines: The US dollar purchasing price was 288.3293 rupees and the sales price were 297.0162 rupees based on the currency exchange rate released by the Central Bank on Tuesday (31).

en.title: Today's currency exchange rate
